items.item: There is a clear statement of the focus of the paper including opinion (see description)
Format follows generic essay style: thesis, development, conclusion
Organization is focused, demonstrating coherence and progression of ideas
Paper demonstrates understanding of the topic
Writing style contains a variety of sentence sturucture showing control of word choice and a clear, concise style
Documented reference sources, i.e. URLs (at least 2)
Is free of most errors in grammar, usage, and mechanics
Talk is no more than 5 minutes in length
Opening of presentation clearly describes topic premise including opinion
Presentation materials are additive to content delivery
Closing of presentation summarizes main points
